name: Flaming-arts-game-studios
body:
### Welcome to Flaming-arts-game-studios
We are a small company thats makes games

### Game in the work 
we are working on a zombie game its in in super pre alpha we dont have much to say at this time. its name is project alpha we are working on a map and models and we are using udk or unity 
thats all i have to say at this time when we have more we will be doing a kick starter. 

### Lead Producer
Hunter i live in Canada and i love games from half live 2 to Dayz to Arma 2 OA i am a PC gamer 
i hope some day to be like EA i hope u love our games and by for now.

### CO Producer/Lead Coder
Brandon i live in the U.S.A and im the CO Producer/Lead Coder this is a super hard job but i love it some time's its fun some time's its not.

### Coder
Zachary i live in the U.S.A i have an ok job at Flaming-arts-game-studios i like all the guys i work with there cool guys

### Modeler
brett i live in the U.S.A i work in the modeling part of Flaming-arts-game-studios its a good job i like it here.

### lead sound designer
Chris i live in the U.S.A i am the lead sound designer
